# Assignment 1

```{r}
# Read data
digit_data <- read.csv("optdigits.csv")

# Partition data (according to Oleg)
n = dim(digit_data)[1]

set.seed(12345)
id = sample(1:n, floor(n*0.5))
digits_train = digit_data[id,]
id1 = setdiff(1:n, id)

set.seed(12345)
id2 = sample(id1, floor(n*0.25))
digits_valid = digit_data[id2,]
id3 = setdiff(id1,id2)
digits_test = digit_data[id3,]
```
